note.content: Mökki
"you ll never have to go to Mondial Relay or Chronopost again"
first draft of random thoughts
CLARINS is quite classy
we need to show them that is is cool and elegant
this is bobo
it s just better
they re a parisian brand that sell perfumes etc. They must have a lot of female employees in their 20s / 30s
that is the demographic that does the most Vinted etc.
big argument : circular economy is a big new thing.
it s big in terms of values (ecology)
it s a cool thing to do. It s the way of the future. It makes sense ecologically, economically
by getting this service, you re showing your employees you care about them and want to give them the best
e-commerce BIG thing, circular economy BIGGER AND BIGGER
new generation are very environmentally conscious, want sustainable consumption
why Mokki ? : the needs, the context
what you can do with the mokki van

what s in it for you ? 
you re making the workplace a better place to live
you re giving your collaborators more incentive to come/stay at the workplace
you re facilitating/encouraging circular economy
l impact de Mokki est quantifiable pour rapport ESG (partenaire INEC)

trend : "great place to work"
trend : we spend a lot of time at work. 
Workplaces are no longer just a place where you work, they are also a place where you live

what you get :

- you offer your employees a premium service
- you effectively lower your building s carbon footprint
- you are a leader in sustainability and innovation

the Premium service your collaborators get :
- receive /send /return /recycle with easy logistics : makes your e-commerce life WAY easier
- démocratise l acces à l economie circulaire
- personalized app that tracks your environmental impact (from reselling and recycling)
(and discover other ways you can act for the planet)
- discover eco-friendly brands, circular economy platforms through our showroom.
bonus : events

POC : tour Initiale numbers :
- users 
- amount KG recycled
questions
comparison table with mokkispace ?
COVID argument

social distancing boosts e-commerce
recession boosts RE-commerce (circular economy)
last mile is a hassle, high fail-rate
work place = place to live
previous presentations
le bureau peut servir de plateforme de consommation responsable

Slide : Mokki-van steps :
2 weeks for design, ...
(see last slide of presentation LaSalle)
- defining KPIs ?
les occupants des immeubles de bureaux sont des adeptes du e-commerce
beaucoup beaucoup de temps passé au bureau
employés quittent leur bureau pour recuperer colis
PRESENTATION
context/ need/ why Mökki
what s in it for you
the premium service
The details : the Mökki van
circulare economy/ e-commerce HUGE
millenials want sustainable consumption
building as a service trend : place to work/live
last-mile : hassle. High failure-rate. Annoying for busy CSP+
make the workplace a platform for sustainable consumption

by adding a Mökki-van to your workplace you are

- offering your employees a premium eco-responsible service
- leading innovation by actively facilitating the circular economy
- quantifiably lowering your carbon footprint
POC
slide 1 : re-commerce HUGE
slide 2 : hassle
23% delivery failure rate !!
slide 3 : Landlords have pressure to change
workplace is not only place to work but also live
--> the best sustainable last-mile actor !!
--> be a facilitator/friend of the circular economy
--> Mokki s solution : make the office a platform for sustainable consumption

slide 1 : recevez/envoyez/renvoyez/recyclez.
Facilement

eventmts de decouv de services et produits
evnmts de sensibilisation à l impact
showroom
l impact de Mökki est tangible

engagement minimum
creneau de 2h quotidien minimum
options d emplacement (voie publique ou propriété)

pour attirer et fidéliser les meilleurs talents, 
les entreprises doivent proposer un lieu de travail 
en adéquation avec les valeurs de ceux-ci
